name: Inheritor's Smite
text: You channel the power of righteousness into your weapon arm, allowing you to strike with great force. Your next melee attack (if made before the end of your next turn) gains a +5 sacred bonus on the attack roll. If the attack hits, you may immediately attempt a bull rush combat maneuver (with a +5 sacred bonus on your combat maneuver check) against the target without provoking an attack of opportunity; if your combat maneuver check exceeds the defender’s CMD by more than 5, you do not need to move with the target to push it back more than 5 feet.
text_zh: 你引导艾奥梅黛的神力加持于自己持握武器的手臂，使你可以用极大的力道猛击目标。你在下一次发动近程攻击（若在下一回合结束前发动攻击）时，攻击检定可以获得+5神圣加值。如果该攻击命中，你可以立即尝试冲撞目标（对抗检定时同样获得+5神圣加值），并且不会引发借机攻击; 如果你的战技检定（CMB）结果比防御方的战技防御（CMD）高5或更多，你无需同对方一起移动就可以把他向后推5尺。多数牧师用本法术在敌方防线打开一个缺口，或是让危险的敌人离开被击倒的友方或重要的物品。
